name: Forms
description:
1 original form

Infinite copies

A game where you have to get through levels by copying and pasting different blocks to get past obstacles.

Basic Controls:

Click to select a block

Right Click to place a block

Use scroll wheel to move ghost block forward or backward

Use Q and E to rotate ghost block

WASD or Arrow keys to move

Space to jump (although you can complete the game without jumping)

Notes:

Sensitivity is slightly weird due to WebGL which messes it up
It is recommended that you press the minus (-) button a few times (if the mouse stops moving press 0)
